metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: Add cheese, sausage or bacon, bell pepper, and onion to the eggs.
In a skillet, cook ground beef, diced onion, and minced garlic until browned.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: This recipe includes Ingredients. To prepare, :  4 cups chicken broth  1/4 cup soy sauce  2 tablespoons miso paste  2 cloves garlic, minced  1 piece ginger, sliced  1/2 pound pork belly, sliced  4 eggs, softboiled  8 ounces ramen noodles  Sliced green onions, nori, and sesame seeds for garnish Instructions:  In a large pot, bring chicken broth, soy sauce, miso paste, minced garlic, and sliced ginger to a boil.

This recipe includes Ingredients. To prepare, :  1/2 pound ground beef  1/2 pound ground pork  1 small onion  2 cloves garlic  1/4 cup breadcrumbs  1 egg  1 teaspoon paprika  1 teaspoon salt  1/2 teaspoon pepper  1/4 cup olive oil  1 cup tomato sauce  Instructions:  Mix ground beef, ground pork, diced onion, minced garlic, breadcrumbs, beaten egg, paprika, salt, and pepper in a bowl.

This recipe includes Ingredients. To prepare, :  8 ounces sweet potato noodles  1/2 pound beef  1 small onion  1 carrot  1 bell pepper  1 cup spinach  2 tablespoons soy sauce  1 tablespoon sesame oil  1 tablespoon sugar  1 tablespoon sesame seeds  Instructions:  Cook noodles according to package instructions, then drain.

This recipe includes Ingredients. To prepare, :  4 cups cubed bread  4 tomatoes  1 cucumber  1 small red onion  1/4 cup basil  1/4 cup olive oil  2 tablespoons red wine vinegar  1 teaspoon salt  Instructions:  Toast bread cubes until golden.
- Mix bread, tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and chopped basil.
